fields.name: DT_Account_Creation_Fault
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong during the creation of the new Account. Please contact the Zeppelin Salesforce Support directly or create a Bug Feedback.

fields.name: DT_Account_Lead_Converted
fields.fieldText:
The Account Lead has been successfully converted.

Click here to navigate to the Account

fields.name: DT_Account_Update_Fault
fields.fieldText: Something went wrong during the update of the existing Account. Please contact the Zeppelin Salesforce Support directly or create a Bug Feedback.

fields.name: Would_you_like_to_convert_this_Account_Lead_to_a_new_Prospect_or_merge_it_into_a
fields.fieldText: Would you like to convert this Account Lead to a new Prospect or merge it into an existing Account?

fields.name: DT_Confirm_Conversion
fields.fieldText: If you do not want to convert or merge this Account Lead, simply close this window.

fields.name: DT_Ibau_Id_filled
fields.fieldText:
This Account already has an Ibau Account connected (ID: {!Merge_Account_Ibau}).


If you would like to connect it to a different Account, please reach out to the Sales Excellence Team.

fields.name: DT_Infobau_Id_filled
fields.fieldText:
This Account already has an Infobau Account connected (ID: {!Merge_Account_Infobau}).


If you would like to connect it to a different Account, please reach out to the Sales Excellence Team.

fields.name: DT_Enter_new_Account_Information
fields.fieldText: Please enter all the necessary information for the new Account you are creating.

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter only 40 characters into the Account Name field.

Please enter a valid phone number, starting with a plus sign, followed by a country code. Do not include letters or special characters, use at least 10 and max. 20 characters. Valid example: +49123456789

Please enter a valid fax number, starting with a plus sign, followed by a country code. Do not include letters or special characters, use at least 10 and max. 20 characters. Valid example: +49123456789
Please enter less than 35 characters for Street.
Please enter less than 30 characters for City.
